abstract.text: Create and manage OpenGL rendering contexts for use in macOS, and perform operations on drawable objects.
Integrate hardware sensing features to produce augmented reality apps and games.
Play, record, and process audio; configure your app’s system audio behavior.
Work with audiovisual assets, control device cameras, process audio, and configure system audio interactions.
Create user interfaces for media playback, complete with transport controls, chapter navigation, picture-in-picture support, and display of subtitles and closed captions.
Display custom destinations to stream media in the system route picker.
Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Make your apps accessible to everyone who uses Apple devices.
Enable privacy-preserving discovery and configuration of accessories.
Download App Store information and app-install activity on behalf of your app’s users.
Provide people with the ability to authorize your apps and websites that access information about them on Apple REST services, like Roster API.
Help users access and manage their external accounts from within your app, without requiring them to enter login credentials.
Share live updates from your app as Live Activities in the Dynamic Island, on the Lock Screen, and on the Smart Stack in watchOS.
Present, process, and register postbacks for in-app ads in the App Store and alternative app marketplaces.
Attribute app-download campaigns that originate from the App Store, Apple News, or Stocks on iOS devices.
Provide apps with access to an advertising identifier.
Access the centralized database for storing users’ contacts.
Access users’ contacts and display them in a graphical interface.
Support In-App Purchases through the App Store for exceptionally large catalogs of custom one-time purchases, subscriptions, and subscriptions with optional add-ons.
Provide people a shortcut to selected content and features of your app.
Download App Store information and app-install activity about your app.
Make your app’s content and actions discoverable with system experiences like Spotlight, widgets, and enhanced action capabilities of Siri, powered by Apple Intelligence.
Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
Secure the installation of alternative distribution apps on iOS or iPadOS devices by vending licenses from your web server.
Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website and in App Store Connect.
Manage your customers’ App Store transactions from your server.
Monitor In-App Purchase events in real time and learn of unreported external purchase tokens, with server notifications from the App Store.
Request user authorization to access app-related data for tracking the user or the device.
Perform multithreaded lossless compression of directories, files, and data.
Reduce API calls and conserve device power by streamlining your app’s georelated searches.
Integrate streaming music with catalog and personal content.
Access the content of the Apple Music Catalog in bulk.
Design, create, and publish signature content for Apple News.
Manage merchant registration through your web platform.

abstract.text: Enhance your iPad app’s user experience by supporting drawing, handwriting, and other features of Apple Pencil.
Access the assets in a user’s media library.
A framework that contain wrappers to a PDF to allow creation of an assessment and student work on that assessment.

Schedule background downloads of large assets after app installation, when the app updates, and periodically while the app remains on-device.

Develop drivers for custom storage devices that communicate with the driver using custom protocols.
Integrate an alternative browser engine into your web browser app.
Create a browser that renders content using an alternative browser engine.
Resources located in an app, framework, or plugin bundle.

Access network services and handle changes in network configurations. Build on abstractions of network protocols to simplify tasks such as working with BSD sockets, administering HTTP and FTP servers, and managing Bonjour services.
Manage your CloudKit containers and databases from JavaScript.
Display the system-calling UI for your app’s VoIP services, and coordinate your calling services with other apps and the system.

Construct and customize charts on every Apple platform.
Integrate playback and editing of assets captured in Cinematic mode into your app.

Display app-specific data on the clock face.
Store structured app and user data in iCloud containers that all users of your app can share.
Find and access identities, that is, users and groups. Display the Identity Picker, which lets users create and select identities.
Reproduce colors accurately across a range of input, output, and display devices.
Customize handling of asynchronous events by combining event-processing operators.
Take control of the drawing environment and render your own content using Metal.
Leverage common compression algorithms for lossless data compression.
Provide contacts managed by your app to the system-wide Contacts ecosystem.
Access the user’s contacts, and format and localize contact information.
Provide an interface that allows people to display information about their contacts.
Use the Core Audio framework to interact with device’s audio hardware.
Add user interfaces to audio units.
Use specialized data types to interact with audio streams, complex buffers, and audiovisual timestamps.

Persist or cache data on a single device, or sync data to multiple devices with CloudKit.
Interact with keyboards, mice, and other human interface devices.
Compose and play haptic patterns to customize your iOS app’s haptic feedback.
Obtain the geographic location and orientation of a device.
Streamline access to users’ location data through a standard, secure UI.
Communicate with MIDI devices such as hardware keyboards and synthesizers.
Integrate machine learning models into your app.
Represent time-based audio-visual assets with essential data types.

Process accelerometer, gyroscope, pedometer, and environment-related events.
Detect NFC tags, read messages that contain NDEF data, and save data to writable tags.
Add search capabilities to your app, and index your content so people can find it from Spotlight and Safari.
Access information about a user’s cellular service provider, such as its unique identifier and whether the carrier allows VoIP.
Create text layouts, optimize font handling, and access font metrics and glyph data.
Declare a transfer representation for your model types to participate in system sharing and data transfer operations.
Process digital video, including manipulation of individual frames, using a pipeline-based API and support for both Metal and OpenGL.
Query AirPort interfaces and choose wireless networks.

Access and utilize common types of data that the data detection system matches.
Expose custom views and modifiers in the Xcode library.

Stream media to a third-party device that a user selects in a system menu.
Display an interface that lets users connect a tvOS app to a mobile device over the local network.
Manage your organization’s devices remotely.
Provides mechanisms to register and block disk mount or unmount events.
Execute code concurrently on multicore hardware by submitting work to dispatch queues managed by the system.
Build systems that run distributed code across multiple processes and devices.
Interact with accessories that track subjects on camera as they move around.
Develop system extensions that enhance user security.
Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website.

Monitor and debug exceptional conditions in code.

Modify the Finder’s user interface to express file synchronization and control.

Speed up OpenGL ES or OpenGL app development. Use math libraries, background texture loading, pre-created shader effects, and a standard view and view controller to implement your rendering loop.

Create app-specific activities your users can share and experience together.

Gain user-space access to Bluetooth devices.

Create app extensions to manage and report unwanted SMS messages and spam calls.
Browse for media devices and control them programmatically from your app.
Read and write most image file formats, and access an image’s metadata.
Present a system interface to generate images based on descriptive information.
Develop input methods and manage communication with client applications, candidates windows, and input method modes.
Evaluate JavaScript programs from within an app, and support JavaScript scripting of your app.
Display a set of recent, personal events that inspire someone to contribute to your app’s creative workflow.
Classify text and other token-based content into developer-defined categories.
Test the identity of executable code on disk and in running processes.
Fetch, provide, and present rich links in your app.
Play Live Photos on the web.
Authenticate users biometrically or with a passphrase they already know.
Present a standard local authentication view icon in a custom authentication view.
Capture content with your app’s camera experience when the device is locked.
Develop drivers for MIDI devices.
Accelerate training and validation of neural networks across the CPU and one or more GPUs.
Secure, customize, and act on email messages that users send and receive.
Customize your app for managed deployments by providing configurable features that rely on secure access to secrets and data that an administrator provisions.
Manage the distribution of apps within an organization.

Define and configure the appearance of shielding views.
Display map or satellite imagery within your app, call out points of interest, and determine placemark information for map coordinates.
Embed interactive Apple Maps on your website, annotate points of interest, and perform georelated searches.
Create an alternative app marketplace, distribute your app on an alternative app marketplace, or distribute your app from your website.
Communicate with and control smart home devices from a variety of manufacturers.
Coordinate and control compatible smart home accessories.
Make your app’s media more accessible by supporting people’s systemwide preferences for video and audio content.
This framework provides a means for developers to create format readers, video decoders, and RAW processors for media that the system doesn’t natively support.
Access read-only collections of the user’s multimedia content.
Find and play songs, audio podcasts, audio books, and more from within your app.

abstract.text: Create a user interface for composing email and text messages, so users can edit and send messages without leaving your app.

Provide a safer experience in your app by detecting and alerting users to nudity in images and videos before displaying them onscreen.
Retrieve data and derived metrics from sensors on an iPhone, or paired Apple Watch.
Develop drivers for serial I/O devices connected to your Mac.
Manage startup items, launch agents, and launch daemons from within an app.

Surface shared content and collaborate in your app.
